seo.title: Whiteboard Video Recorder - Record Slide Tutorials Online | freesavevideo
seo.description: Create, move, and resize slides, then record whiteboard tutorials with camera overlay in your browser. No install required.
seo.keywords: whiteboard recorder,slide recorder,online video recorder,excalidraw recorder,tutorial recording

teleprompter.placeholder:
Paste your script here...
Only you can see it; it will not appear in the recording.

shortcuts.whiteboard_body: Use Excalidraw top toolbar for select/draw/text/zoom/pan.
shortcuts.recording_body: P to start/stop, K to pause/resume.

export.title: Export format
export.note: Default export is MP4. If MP4 recording is unsupported by the browser, it will automatically fall back to WebM.

camera.title: Camera (picture-in-picture)
camera.fill_frame: Fill the whole recording frame with camera

mic.title: Microphone
mic.hum_hint: Applies high-pass + 50/60Hz harmonic notch before recording.

notice.before_unload: Recording is in progress. Leaving this page may interrupt recording and lose export data.
notice.pagehide_autostop: Page moved to background. Recording has been auto-stopped to protect file integrity.
notice.whiteboard_temporarily_unavailable: Whiteboard frame is temporarily unavailable. Waiting for recovery...
notice.whiteboard_load_failed: Whiteboard failed to load. Please refresh and try again.
notice.mic_test_unsupported: Current browser does not support microphone level test.
notice.mic_test_low_input: Microphone input is too low. Please check input device or permission.
notice.mic_test_failed: Microphone test failed. Please allow microphone permission in browser.
notice.preflight_canvas_not_ready: Preflight failed: canvas is not ready.
notice.preflight_mediarecorder_unsupported: Preflight failed: current browser does not support MediaRecorder.
notice.preflight_capturestream_unsupported: Preflight failed: current browser does not support canvas.captureStream.
notice.preflight_no_mic_device: Preflight failed: no microphone device detected.
notice.mp4_fallback_webm: Current browser does not support MP4 recording. Fell back to WebM.
notice.webm_fallback_mp4: Current browser does not support WebM recording. Fell back to MP4.
notice.no_supported_mime: Current browser does not support any usable recording codec. Recording may fail to start.
notice.record_will_include_mic: Recording will include microphone audio. Please confirm microphone permission is granted.
notice.record_start_canvas_unavailable: Failed to start recording: canvas stream is unavailable.
notice.record_crop_fallback: Recording crop failed. Falling back to full canvas capture.
notice.video_track_ended: Video track ended unexpectedly. Auto-stopping recording.
notice.mic_track_ended: Microphone track ended. Subsequent recording will have no audio.
notice.recorder_init_failed: Recorder initialization failed. Try changing export format or browser.
notice.recorder_error_stopping: Recorder error occurred. Attempting safe stop and export.
notice.no_output_chunks: No exportable chunks generated. Please try recording again.
notice.output_too_small: Output file is too small. Recording may have been too short or interrupted.
notice.export_complete: Export complete: {{ext}} ({{size_kb}} KB) è·¯ Stop reason: {{cause}}{{tail}}
notice.export_tail: , last segment may be incomplete ({{seconds}}s without new chunks)
notice.record_start_failed: Failed to start recording. Please check browser permission and codec support.
notice.stop_failed: Failed to stop recording. Please retry.
notice.stop_timeout_forced: Stopping recording timed out. Forced finalize applied.
notice.pause_unsupported: Current browser does not support pause recording.
notice.resume_unsupported: Current browser does not support resume recording.
